tool_description: This API provides you with a selection of Strong Buy stocks from Trading View depending on the market
name: Strong Buy Stocks Live
title: Strong Buy Stocks Live

api_list.name: Get individual market stocks
api_list.description: Gets stocks from individual markets that are available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://strong-buy-stocks-live.p.rapidapi.com/stocks/USA"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "strong-buy-stocks-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://strong-buy-stocks-live.p.rapidapi.com/stocks/{stockid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "strong-buy-stocks-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
